participant_1.background:
The weather is perfect for practicing my juggling tricks.
i live in chicago.
I live with my furry friends and enjoy my creative hobbies.
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.
I'm not too close with my family, but I'm hoping to change that.

participant_2.background:
My hobbies include coloring my hair bright colors and trying new coffee shops with my husband.
i work on a farm.
I found a geocache while riding my bike the other day.
I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time.
I moved to the mountains so my dogs could have more space to run and play.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a juggler living in Chicago. What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I like to color my hair bright colors and try new coffee shops with my husband. What's your favorite book?
The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. I've read it like 5 times. It's so funny and creative.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out! I'm currently reading The Name of the Wind. It's a fantasy novel that's really long, but I'm enjoying it so far.
I love fantasy novels! I'll have to check that one out too.
You should! It's about a young man who's trying to become a wizard. It's really well written.
That sounds awesome! I love books about magic.
Me too! I'm a sucker for anything fantasy or sci-fi.
Me too! I love to read about different worlds and imaginary creatures.
Me too! It's so much fun to get lost in a good book.
Yeah! It's the best way to escape from reality for a little while.
Exactly! I love to read when I'm feeling stressed or overwhelmed. It helps me to relax and clear my head.
Me too! Reading is the best way to de-stress.
It really is! I'm so glad we found something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who loves to read.
Definitely! I can't wait to talk to you more about books.
Me too! I'm sure we'll have a lot to talk about.
